title: Champion Screen Bug (Rek'Sai=Anivia Gyazo Image)

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body: So I was browsing though the champions and saw that Rek'Sai's image was replaced with Anivia's. Just something I noticed, nothing game breaking.

replies.body: And Renekton's by Azir's as per your image.

OMG LOL IS BROKEN
WE CANNOT PLAY ANYMORE
EVERYONE ALT + F4
